title: level 30
body: i'm level 30 and can't post comments / post anywhere else basically telling me i'm not above lvl 5/7 etc

replies.body: Sometimes your account has to sync to the boards when posting for the first time.  It looks like your post here has sync'd you up, so you should be good to go!  :D
That's weird. You might want to run diagnostics using the client setting menu just to be sure the client isn't bugged
